text:
Hi everyone! We're working on a platform that aims to connect startup founders and top-level IT talents: developers, designers, product managers, etc.

Today we've launched on Product Hunt and would appreciate your feedback!
<https://www.producthunt.com/posts/expert-remote>

P.S. if anyone lost jobs in the current market, feel free to leave your CV here: <https://developers.expertremote.io> :wink:

Hi all I'm honored to introduce Hubdoor Marketing, our premier company that excels in Website Design, HubSpot services, and cutting-edge SEO solutions.
<https://hubdoormarketing.com/>
 We take pride in our dedicated team of HubSpot Certified experts and highly skilled web designers, specializing in the following key areas:

 1)Creating logos, mockups, and responsive web designs.
 2)Crafting Landing Pages, Email Templates, and Website Pages within HubSpot.
 3)Onboarding for HubSpot Marketing, Sales, and CMS.
 4)Custom API integrations within HubSpot.
 5)Seamless integration between HubSpot and other platforms.
 6)Expertise in supporting report generation and workflow management within HubSpot.
 7)Development of custom HubSpot CRM cards.
 8)Setting up HubSpot blogs for enhanced online presence

 We are committed to delivering on time, ensuring high-quality work at competitive prices. Give us the opportunity, and we'll establish a long-lasting and mutually beneficial partnership
